EU gives $1.6 billion in profits from frozen Russian assets to Ukraine  —  The European Union Friday transferred $1.6 billion in profits from frozen Russian Central Bank assets to Ukraine.  EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen declared that the EU stands with Ukraine.
